Docs.param: Chunks of text to spell check.
Docs.summary: Implements the Web service that exposes the spelling checker.
Docs.returns: A SpellCheckResults structure that contains information about the spelling checker analysis.

remarks.para: A chunk can consist of multiple words, all of which are analyzed at the same time.
